item.title: 嘉信理财任命 Michael Verdeschi 为首席财务官
item.description: 查尔斯-施瓦布（Charles Schwab）周四向美国证券监管机构提交的一份文件显示，经纪公司已任命迈克尔-韦德斯基（Michael Verdeschi）为首席财务官，自 10 月 1 日起生效。【原文：Brokerage firm Charles Schwab has appointed Michael Verdeschi as its chief financial officer, effective Oct. 1, according to a filing with the U.S. securities regulator on Thursday.】

item.title: 谷歌人工智能系统在数学推理方面取得进展
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周四发布了一对人工智能系统，展示了在解决复杂数学问题方面取得的进展，这是生成式人工智能发展的一个关键前沿领域。【原文：Alphabet's Google unveiled a pair of artificial intelligence systems on Thursday that demonstrated advances in solving complex mathematical problems, a key frontier of generative AI development.】

item.title: 巴西以对超级富豪征税为由对 G20 税务合作声明表示欢迎
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周四表示，二十国集团（G20）财政领导人准备批准一项关于国际税务合作的联合声明，以解决超级富豪征税等问题。【原文：Brazilian Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said on Thursday that G20 finance leaders were poised to endorse a joint declaration on international tax cooperation addressing issues such as the taxation of super-rich individuals.】

item.title: 美国加密货币交易所 Coinbase 新增三名董事会成员，其中包括 OpenAI 高管
item.description: 美国加密货币交易所 Coinbase 周四告诉路透社，该公司董事会新增了三名成员，其中包括来自 ChatGPT 制造商 OpenAI 的一名高管，因为该公司正在加大力度左右美国的加密货币政策。【原文：U.S. cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase has added three new members to its board of directors, including an executive from ChatGPT-maker OpenAI, as the company steps up its efforts to sway U.S. crypto policy, Coinbase told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 以科技股为主导的抛售推动 NDX 期权成交量创新高
item.description: 美国股市的大跌正在推动纳斯达克 100 指数的交易期权创下历史新高，因为科技股巨头的动荡打击了这一科技股重仓股。【原文：The selloff in U.S. stocks is driving record trading options on the Nasdaq 100 Index as the tech-heavy gauge is battered by turbulence in giant tech stocks.】

item.title: 喷气机制造工业问题给潮湿航展订单蒙上阴影
item.description: 周四，世界上最大的航空展落下帷幕，沙特新喷气式客机的可靠订单也未能驱散近期飞机生产无法快速满足需求的阴霾。【原文：The world's largest air show fizzled out on Thursday with a solid new Saudi jetliner order unable to dispel the gloom over recent problems in producing planes fast enough to meet demand.】

item.title: 阿克曼削减新基金目标规模，要求投资者做出承诺
item.description: 比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）表示，他在美国上市的新基金 Pershing Square USA 的规模将大大小于人们最初所说的 250 亿美元，理由是投资者对基金结构和如何投资现金普遍感到紧张。【原文：Bill Ackman said his new U.S. listed fund, Pershing Square USA, will be dramatically smaller than the $25 billion people initially said he could raise, citing investors' general nervousness about the structure and how to invest the cash.】

item.title: 对冲基金流动 摩根士丹利称宏观对冲基金将抛售 450 亿美元股票
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）周四在给机构客户的评论中说，计算机驱动的宏观对冲基金策略周三抛售了 200 亿美元的股票，在股市暴跌后的下周至少还将抛售 250 亿美元的股票，这是十年来最大的风险平仓事件之一。【原文：Computer-driven macro hedge fund strategies on Wednesday sold $20 billion in equities and are set to shed at least more $25 billion over the next week after the stock rout, in one of the largest risk-unwinding events in a decade, Morgan Stanley said in commentary to institutional clients on Thursday.】

item.title: 低成本航空公司 Flybondi 和 Jetsmart 瞄准巴西市场
item.description: 低成本航空公司 Flybondi 和 Jetsmart 的高管表示，未来几个月，这两家公司将把巴西作为首选飞行目的地，并希望随着市场的开放而扩大航线。【原文：Low-cost airlines Flybondi and Jetsmart are targeting Brazil as a top flight destination in coming months, looking to expand routes as the market opens up, executives at both firms said.】

item.title: 拜耳旗下孟山都公司将支付 1.6 亿美元解决西雅图多氯联苯污染诉讼案
item.description: 孟山都公司将支付 1.6 亿美元，以了结西雅图市指控德国拜耳公司旗下的孟山都公司使用有毒化学物质多氯联苯污染该市排水系统和当地下杜瓦米什河的诉讼。【原文：Monsanto will pay $160 million to settle a lawsuit by the city of Seattle that accused the unit of Germany's Bayer of polluting the city's drainage system and the local Lower Duwamish River with toxic chemicals known as PCBs.】

item.title: 房地美称，美国 30 年期固定利率抵押贷款升至 6.78
item.description: 截至7月25日的一周内，美国30年期固定利率抵押贷款的平均利率升至6.78%，比今年早些时候的峰值低了约半个百分点，因为购房者在进入市场时仍表现出犹豫不决的迹象。【原文：The average rate on the popular U.S. 30-year fixed-rate mortgage edged up to 6.78% for the week ending July 25, leaving it about half a percentage point below its peak earlier this year, as buyers still show signs of hesitancy to enter the market.】

item.title: 空难受害者家属称，美国法官应拒绝波音公司的认罪协议
item.description: 美国地区法官里德-奥康纳（Reed O'Connor）周四表示，司法部与波音公司达成的 "甜心 "认罪协议应予以拒绝，在两起致命的 737 MAX 飞机坠毁事故中，346 名遇难者中有 15 人的亲属这样表示。【原文：U.S. District Judge Reed O'Connor should reject a "sweetheart" plea deal the Justice Department struck with Boeing , relatives of 15 of the 346 people killed in two fatal 737 MAX crashes said on Thursday.】

item.title: 巴西的 "亿万富翁税 "想法在 G20 会议上广受好评，但被认为难以实施
item.description: 本周举行的二十国集团（G20）财长会议上，巴西提出的向全球超级富豪征税以减少不平等现象的想法受到好评，但欧美高官周四表示，这一想法的实施将面临巨大挑战。【原文：Brazil's idea to tax the world's super-rich to reduce inequality was well received at a meeting of G20 finance ministers this week, but will be very challenging to implement, top European and U.S. officials said on Thursday.】

item.title: OpenAI 发布人工智能搜索工具 SearchGPT
item.description: OpenAI 周四表示，它正在有选择性地推出 SearchGPT，这是一个人工智能驱动的搜索引擎，可以实时访问互联网上的信息。【原文：OpenAI on Thursday said it is selectively rolling out SearchGPT, an artificial intelligence-powered search engine with real time access to the information from the Internet.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，通用汽车的 Cruise 计划明年开始对机器人出租车收费
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，通用汽车公司的自动驾驶技术部门 Cruise 的目标是在今年晚些时候恢复运行完全自动驾驶的乘车服务，并在 2025 年初收取车费。【原文：General Motors' self-driving technology unit, Cruise, aims to return to running fully autonomous rides later this year and charge fares by early 2025, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 花旗称，特朗普当选总统将给石油带来大部分看跌风险
item.description: 花旗银行（Citi）周四在一份研究报告中称，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）就任总统后，由于关税和石油友好政策等综合因素，以及推动石油输出国组织（OPEC）及其盟国（OPEC+）向市场释放更多石油，可能会对油价构成净利空。【原文：A Donald Trump presidency could be net bearish for oil prices due to a combination of factors including tariffs and oil-friendly policies, and pushing the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries and allies (OPEC+) to release more oil into the market, Citi said in a research note on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国参议院调查 Steward Health 破产案，传唤首席执行官
item.description: 美国参议院的一个委员会周四开始对私营医院网络 Steward Health 的破产进行调查，并投票决定迫使该公司的首席执行官在 9 月份的公开听证会上作证。【原文：A U.S. Senate committee opened an investigation into the bankruptcy of privately owned hospital network Steward Health on Thursday, voting to compel the company's CEO to testify at a public hearing in September.】

item.title: 资深立法者称，为向公司施压，YouTube 在俄罗斯的运行速度本周可能下降多达 40
item.description: 一位与当局关系密切的俄罗斯资深立法者周四表示，YouTube 在俄罗斯台式电脑上的运行速度本周可能会下降约 40%，下周可能会下降多达 70%。【原文：YouTube speeds on desktop computers in Russia may drop by around 40% this week and up to 70% the following week, a senior Russian lawmaker, close to the authorities, said on Thursday, part of a drive to persuade the video hosting site to reinstate blocked Russian channels.】

item.title: 加拿大沃尔玛上调约 4 万名员工的时薪
item.description: 沃尔玛加拿大公司周四表示，该公司已投资 5300 万美元，在本月初提高了约 4 万名店员的小时工资。【原文：Walmart Canada said on Thursday it has invested $53 million to increase hourly wages for about 40,000 of its store associates earlier this month.】

item.title: 加州最高法院支持将 Uber 和 Lyft 司机视为独立承包商的投票措施
item.description: 加利福尼亚州最高法院周四维持了选民批准的一项措施，允许优步（Uber）和 Lyft 等应用服务公司将这个美国人口最多的州的司机视为独立承包商，而不是有权享受更多福利的雇员。【原文：California's top state court on Thursday upheld a measure approved by voters allowing app-based services such as Uber and Lyft to consider drivers in the most populous U.S. state as independent contractors rather than as employees entitled to greater benefits.】

item.title: 冷藏房地产投资信托基金 Lineage 在今年最大的首次公开募股中上涨 5
item.description: 冷藏房地产投资信托公司 Lineage 的股票周四在纳斯达克首次亮相时上涨了 5%，表明投资者对今年最大的公开发行股票的热情。【原文：Cold storage real estate investment trust Lineage's shares gained 5% in their Nasdaq debut on Thursday, signaling investor enthusiasm for the year's biggest public offering.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司开设普惠维修中心，发动机维修需求激增
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周四在葡萄牙开设了普拉特-惠特尼（P&W）发动机维修中心，预计该中心全面投入运营后每年将增加 6 亿欧元（6.53 亿美元）的收入。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer on Thursday opened a maintenance hub for Pratt & Whitney (P&W) engines in Portugal, which it expects to bring in an additional 600 million euros ($653 million) in revenues per year once fully operational.】

item.title: 高端奢侈品持续热销，爱马仕第二季度销售额增长 13
item.description: Birkin手袋制造商爱马仕周四公布的第二季度销售额增长了13%，表明富裕消费者对其奢侈手袋的持续追捧，即使不那么富裕的消费者也会退却。【原文：Birkin-bag maker Hermes reported a 13% rise in second-quarter sales on Thursday, demonstrating the continued appetite from wealthy shoppers for its luxury handbags, even as less affluent consumers pull back.】

item.title: 高管称，亚马逊正竞相开发比英伟达更便宜、更快的人工智能芯片
item.description: 周五下午，在位于德克萨斯州奥斯汀的亚马逊公司芯片实验室内，六七名工程师正在对一款保密的新型服务器设计进行测试。【原文：Inside Amazon.com's chip lab in Austin, Texas, half a dozen engineers on a Friday afternoon put a closely guarded new server design through its paces.】

item.title: 今年的 "万物反弹 "戛然而止，投资者萌生退意
item.description: 从加密货币到黄金，投资者正在放弃今年最喜欢的一些交易，因为耀眼的超级大盘股的回落已经演变成一场多管齐下的大跌，打击了从加密货币到黄金的所有领域，也让判断市场的下一步走势变得更加复杂。【原文：Investors are ditching some of this year's favourite trades as a retreat in the glitzy megacaps has snowballed into a multi-pronged selloff that has hit everything from cryptocurrency to gold, and made calling the market's next move ever more complex.】

item.title: 马斯克将与特斯拉董事会讨论 50 亿美元 xAI 投资事宜
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周四表示，他将讨论对人工智能初创公司xAI投资50亿美元的事宜，这家电动汽车制造商希望加倍努力，加快其机器人出租车和自动驾驶产品的开发。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on Thursday he will discuss a $5 billion investment in artificial intelligence startup xAI, as the electric-vehicle maker looks to double down on efforts to expedite the development of its robotaxi and self-driving products.】

item.title: 瓦莱罗计划在 2024 年第三季度将炼油厂的综合产能提高至 92
item.description: 根据投资者关系副总裁 Homer Bhullar 公布的计划，美国炼油商 Valero Energy Corp 计划在 2024 年第三季度将其 14 家炼油厂的总吞吐能力提高到 320 万桶/日的 92%。【原文：U.S. refiner Valero Energy Corp plans to operate its 14 refineries up to 92% of their combined 3.2 million barrel-per-day (bpd) total throughput capacity in the third quarter of 2024, according to plans announced by Homer Bhullar, vice president of investor relations.】

item.title: 科技股动荡冲击市场，英伟达杠杆 ETF 加大投资者风险
item.description: 如果华尔街以科技股为主导的大跌持续下去，对英伟达进行杠杆押注的风险可能会更大。【原文：Making leveraged bets on Nvidia is likely to get much riskier if Wall Street's tech-led selloff continues.】

item.title: 派拉蒙、Skydance 合并案面临股东的法庭挑战
item.description: 根据周三向特拉华州大法官法庭提交的一份诉讼，派拉蒙全球公司的一位投资者起诉阻止其与 Skydance Media 的合并，称该交易将使其股东损失 16.5 亿美元。【原文：A Paramount Global investor has sued to the block its merger with Skydance Media, saying the deal would cost its shareholders $1.65 billion, according to a lawsuit filed in Delaware's Chancery Court on Wednesday.】

item.title: 耶伦称赞拜登经济表现 "非凡"，称美国经济软着陆已步入正轨
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周四称赞美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）实现了 "令人瞩目的经济复苏"，并表示第二季度国内生产总值（GDP）和通胀数据证实美国正走在 "稳定增长和通胀下降 "的道路上。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen on Thursday lauded President Joe Biden for a "remarkable economic recovery" and said that second-quarter GDP and inflation data confirmed that the U.S. is on a path "to steady growth and declining inflation."】
